data.text: And it came to pass, as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day, that they watched him.
And, behold, there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy.
And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees, saying,
And they held their peace. And he took
And answered them, saying,
And they could not answer him again to these things.
¶ And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden, when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms; saying unto them,
¶ Then said he also to him that bade him,
¶ And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things, he said unto him, Blessed
Then said he unto him,
¶ And there went great multitudes with him: and he turned, and said unto them,
